RPGGrid.actor
Class ThePlayer

java.lang.Object
  RPGGrid.actor.Actor
      RPGGrid.actor.ThePlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ThePlayerDown, ThePlayerLeft, ThePlayerRight
public class ThePlayer
extends RPGGrid.actor.Actor

A ThePlayer is the entity through which the user interacts with the game.

Author:
Sean MacLane

Constructor Summary
ThePlayer(RPGGrid.world.RPGWorld w, FinalFantasy.FFCharacter c)
          Constructs a player with a reference to a given world, and removes any color filters
 
Method Summary
 void down()
          Causes the player to interact with the WorldObject below it, moves the camera if necisary, and changes the icon of the player.
 FinalFantasy.FFCharacter getFFCharacter()
          Gives the Character reperesented by ThePlayer.
 RPGGrid.world.RPGWorld getWorld()
          Returns the world the player is in.
 void left()
          Causes the player to interact with the WorldObject to its left, moves the camera if necisary, and changes the icon of the player.
 void right()
          Causes the player to interact with the WorldObject to its right, moves the camera if necisary, and changes the icon of the player.
 void up()
          Causes the player to interact with the WorldObject above it, moves the camera if necisary, and changes the icon of the player.
 
Methods inherited from class
act, getColor, getDirection, getGrid, getLocation, moveTo, putSelfInGrid, removeSelfFromGrid, setColor, setDirection, toString
 
Methods inherited from class
